zeejfps.engine.graphics

Class Bitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • zeejfps.engine.graphics.Bitmap

  • public class Bitmap
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that stores the color of each pixel in a single int[] that later can be modified and rendered to screen.
    Author:
    Zeejfps

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bitmap(Bitmap copy)
      Creates a copy of passed in bitmap.
      Bitmap(int width, int height)
      Creates a bitmap with given width and height and initializes all the pixels to 0.
      Bitmap(int width, int height, int[] pixelData)
      Creates a bitmap with given width, height, and pixel color data.

      This method will rotate the bitmap by 180 degrees.

      This method will rotate the bitmap by 90 degrees clock wise.

      • Bitmap

        public Bitmap(int width,
      int height,
      int[] pixelData)
        Creates a bitmap with given width, height, and pixel color data.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the bitmap.
        height - the height of the bitmap.
        pixelData - the color data of each pixel.

      • Bitmap

      int height)

        height - the height of the bitmap.

    • Method Detail

      • setPixel

        public void setPixel(int x,
            int y,
            int color)
        This method sets an individual pixel to a given color. Using this formula to determine witch pixel: (y * width + x)
        Parameters:
        x - the x location of the pixel.
        y - the y location of the pixel.
        color - the color of the pixel, a HEX value.

      • getPixel

        public int getPixel(int x,
           int y)
        This method returns the HEX color value of a pixel at given x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - the x location of the pixel.
        y - the y location of the pixel.
        Returns:
        HEX color value of the pixel.

      • getPixels

        public int[] getPixels()
        Returns:
        the array of pixels containing the color data.

      • rotate90CCW

        public Bitmap rotate90CCW()
        This method will rotate the bitmap by 90 degrees counter clock wise.
        Returns:
        'this' bitmap after rotation.

        public Bitmap rotate90CW()

        'this' bitmap after rotation.
